fixed_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Mabufu

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bufu

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 2.4%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.2%. After knocking down a foe, increase Ice damage by 26% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Nipping at your Nose

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.2%. After knocking down a foe, increase Ice damage by 31% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Nipping at your Nose I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
